targets.query: SELECT mean("value") AS "value" FROM "kb_resource" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND "resource_path" =~ /$resource$/ AND "name" =~ /$endpoint$/ AND "response_group" =~ /$response_status$/ AND "component" =~ /mean$|p50|p75|p95|p99$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "component" fill(0)

SELECT sum("value") AS "value" FROM "kb_resource" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND "resource_path" =~ /$resource$/ AND "name" =~ /$endpoint$/ AND "component" =~ /m\d\d?/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "component" fill(0)

SELECT sum("value")* 60 AS "value" FROM "kb_resource" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND "resource_path" =~ /$resource$/ AND "name" =~ /$endpoint$/ AND "component" = 'm1_rate' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "component" fill(0)

SELECT sum("value") AS "value" FROM "kb_resource" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND "resource_path" =~ /$resource$/ AND "name" =~ /$endpoint$/ AND "response_group" =~ /$response_status$/ AND "component" =~ /m\d\d?_/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "component" fill(0)

list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM kb_resource WITH KEY = host

list.label: Resource
list.name: resource
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM kb_resource WITH KEY = resource_path

list.label: Endpoint
list.name: endpoint
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM kb_resource WITH KEY = "name" WHERE "resource_path" =~ /$resource/

list.label: Response Status
list.name: response_status
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM kb_resource WITH KEY = response_group WHERE resource_path =~ /$resource/ AND name =~  /$endpoint/
